messages.text: Of course. I'll order for you.

It's very hard for me to deal with what you have to face. The things you have to go through. It doesn't suit a 20-year-old girl. Friends held hostage, war, the front line, wounded. That's enough for a lifetime of experiences. I feel like I can't protect you from all this. And maybe I need to understand that my children now need to protect me. Changing of the guard. You're now protecting us. The country. I want you to know that I admire you for everything you do. And what you go through. And the composure. It's not to be taken for granted at all.
I'm just doing what's expected of me
